name: IDA
tagline: An introduction to data analysis, using R. Experimental.
body:
### What is this?
This page contains teaching material for the [Introduction to Data Analysis](http://f.briatte.org/teaching/ida/) course. The course handbooks are not included due to copyright restrictions.

### Who is this for?
Anyone who might want access to the whole course in R Markdown format. More details as soon as the course is over.

Enjoy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
